SELECT t.DEPT_ID_ AS deptId, t.DEPT_CODE_ AS deptCode, t.DEPT_NAME_ AS deptName, t.DEPT_NAME_EN_ AS deptNameEn, t.ADDRESS_ AS address, t.CONTACT_TELEPHONE_ AS contactTelephone, t.DESC_ AS description, t.PARENT_DEPT_ID_ AS parentDeptId, t.IS_POST_STUDENT_ AS isPostStudent, t.IS_POST_ONJOB_STUDENT_ AS isPostOnjobStudent, t.IS_UNDER_STUDENT_ AS isUnderStudent, t.CURRENT_STATE_ AS currentState, t.IS_COURSE_ AS isCourse, t.CREATE_BY_ AS createBy, t.CREATE_DATE_ AS createDate, t.IS_FACULTY_ AS isFaculty, t.LAST_UPDATE_BY_ AS lastUpdateBy, t.LAST_UPDATE_DATE_ AS lastUpdateDate FROM department_t t WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.DEPT_CODE_ IS NOT NULL AND t.CURRENT_STATE_ = '1'
AND t.IS_FACULTY_ = '1'
AND t.DEPT_CODE_ <> '-10000'
AND t.IS_UNDER_STUDENT_ =1
AND t.IS_POST_STUDENT_ =1
ORDER BY t.DEPT_ID_ NOT IN ('697'),t.DEPT_CODE_ ASC
